2008.01.25 dina anka 1533/16 darana gasat niwedanaya yatathe "a" ha "aa" lesa warga kara athi karmantha kriyakarakam walin siduwana parisara dushanayan ha sambandha paminili apa wetha yomu kala yuthuyi. 1980 anka 47 darana sanshodhitha jathika parisara panatha yatathe dakwa nomathi wenath kriyakarakam sambandha paminili wibhaga kirimata madhyama parisara adhikariyata balayak nomathi bawa karunawen salakanna.

ehidi asu prashna kihipayak ha eewata manthriwaraya dun pilithuru mese ya.aanduwa yam dushkarathawakata pathwela thiyana awasthawaka rajaye prathipaththiya niwaradi nam ee thiranaya kriyathmaka karanna ejapaya ehen mehen nemeyi siyayata siyayak rajayata sahaya denna sudanam bawa me thulin api penwa di thibenawa.sigarat pakattuwe siyayata 80 ka rupamaya awawada yedime thiranayata ejapaya pamanak neweyi siyalu paksha sahaya denawa.me thiranaya kriyathmaka kaloth ehi wadi prayojanaya labenne ada inna wadihitiyanta nowa idiriyata ena labala anagatha parapurata kiyala api wishwasa karanawa.

jak gasime bhugoliya pasubima..apa aasiyanu samajaya thula sankara yayi poduwe handunwanu labana, amerikanu saha yuropaya athulu batahira ratawaladi aththenma bas ho podu prawahana sewa thula ek ayekuge ange thawa ayeku wadima pawa pilikul sahagatha deyak lesa handunwayi.eeratawala boho wita podu prawahana sewawala aasana aasana thana aththe minisunta nisa eewayehi wadi wi gaman ganna kenekuta pawa thawath kenekuge ange nogawi gaman kala hakiya.eheth lankiya duragaman sewa baswala ange nogawi yamata nam wishesha thahadu kaballak wath ragena ya yuthuya..manda ee aasana thana aththe skubi du wani kathakarana awidina diga ballanta wana tharam kudawata wana heyini.anek karuna nam apa athulu dakunu aasiya saha pilipinaya indunisi,yawa wani ratawala prawahana sewawanha ිathi adhika magi thadabadayayi..mewan thadabadayak thula hamuduru kenek naggath wadi wisitina aya undage athe pawa samahara wita yannata sidu weyi.nawasilanthaye dumriya sewaye sewayakarana ma danna handunana keneku pawasuwe owunge kalasatahan kalin kalata wenas wana bawayi..ee wenas wana kalasatahan web adawi ha wenath marga walin anek mahajanayata danum denu labe..esema yamkisi thadabada pawathina awasthawak nam ee adala dumriya sthanadhipathi saha niladharinta ewelema amathara dumriya ho madiri ek kara ganime pahasukama owunta thibe..ma danna kalayaka sita ruhunu kumari dumriya 3.50ta kotuwen pitath weyi..kolambaa sita mathara dakwa nokadi(enam basa wenath dumriyatakata maru nowiya yuthu) awasana dumriya ruhunu kumari weyi..in pasu mathara dakwa yana dumriyatakata goda wuwoth aniwaryen galledi wenath dumriyakata maru wiya yuthuya..esema uda margaye nawalapitiyen ehata dumriya yana ena welawa kiyannata ee dumriya sthanadhipathiwarun bhawitha karanne kalaguna warthawa kiyana kramawedayaki..ennath puluwan samahara welawata hawas wela kochchiyak”..idin mewani karana nisa kanthawak nowa pirimiyekta pawa thawa kenekuge ange nogawi podu prawahana sewa wala gamankirima nam sidunowana deyaki..
